mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pf_general_member(general_member_no, seeking_flag, membership, career) VALUES(#{number}, 1, 'none', #{career})
mapper.select: SELECT g.general_member_no, m.email, m.id, m.type, m.name, g.seeking_flag, g.membership, g.career, m.photo FROM pf_members m JOIN pf_general_member g ON m.member_no = g.general_member_no WHERE (m.id=#{email} OR m.email=#{email}) AND m.pwd=password(#{password}) WHERE m.email=#{email} AND m.provider=#{provider}

SELECT g.general_member_no, m.email, m.id, m.type, m.name, g.seeking_flag, g.membership, g.career, m.photo FROM pf_members m JOIN pf_general_member g ON m.member_no = g.general_member_no WHERE m.member_no=#{no}
SELECT * FROM pf_members m JOIN pf_general_member g ON m.member_no = g.general_member_no WHERE m.member_no=#{no}
